definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
to yell/to shout/to call out for (a person)
shouting and screaming (idiom); to scream loudly/to rant/to kick up a racket/to conduct vigorous propaganda

sentences.english: Then she began to angrily hallo me.
sentences.chinese: 然後她開始向我憤怒地大喊大叫起來。

sentences.english: Sharon shouldn't shout at the sheep.
I shouted to the pedestrians for help, but no one stopped.
sentences.chinese: 我大喊着向行人道上的路人求助，但是沒有人停下來。

sentences.english: Dropping my broom, hate yelling to rise.
sentences.chinese: 我扔下掃帚，恨恨地大喊起來。

sentences.english: You might have to guess, based on whether they seem to be yelling at the same kids.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕你得根據他們是否衝着同一個孩子大喊大叫來猜。

sentences.english: Gates yelled to a crowd outside his house as he was handcuffed.
sentences.chinese: 當他被戴上手銬時，蓋茨向房子周圍的人羣大喊。

sentences.english: Far above. the giish cries out. He fmanotherys to the ground.
sentences.chinese: 巨人從地下大喊一聲，便掉到地上。

sentences.english: He never yelled at us for playing in his yard .
sentences.chinese: 我們在他的院子裏玩耍，他也從不對我們大喊大叫。

sentences.english: Junho yelled at Jay and Junsu ignored Jay when he tried to explain.
sentences.chinese: 俊昊對宰範大喊大叫而且峻秀無視宰範的解釋。

sentences.english: Astride the merry-go-round, the baby yelled with rapture.
sentences.chinese: 孩子騎在旋轉木馬上，興奮地大喊大叫。

sentences.english: The goose heard the racket and she, too, started hollering.
sentences.chinese: 那隻母鵝也聽到吵鬧聲，便對韋伯大喊起來。

sentences.english: Xiao LAN is very surprised on this finding, she shouted niang hurriedly to the memorial tablet.
sentences.chinese: 蕭嵐對這一發現也非常驚訝，她連忙對着牌位大喊娘。

sentences.english: Seeing her getting into her car, I jogged after her and yelled, "Wait. " She ran over my foot.
sentences.chinese: 我大喊等等，她就開着車從我腳上軋了過去。

sentences.english: He stood high toward Zhou Qingqing home Shouting sought audience with side drew security.
sentences.chinese: 他站在高處朝着周青青家大喊求見一面引來了保安。

sentences.english: He shouted to Bellick and asked him where his girl friend was.
sentences.chinese: 他向貝里克大喊，問他到底自己的女朋友在哪裏。

definition: to shout loudly/to raise a cry/to yell
to yell/to shout/to call out for (a person)
shouting and screaming (idiom); to scream loudly/to rant/to kick up a racket/to conduct vigorous propaganda
to roar/to howl/to shriek/roar or howl of an animal/bellow of rage
to rain curses (on sb)/to let sb have it/to bawl sb out
